topic: How to deploy data pipelines using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to deploy data pipelines using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Deploying Data Pipelines Using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide provides a concise and accurate overview of how to deploy data pipelines using the FastAPI framework with Python 3.12+. It covers key points, code examples, version notes, and caveats related to the process.
key_points: Understanding FastAPI: A modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.6+.
Python 3.12+ support: This guide focuses on utilizing features specific to Python 3.12 and later versions.
Creating a data pipeline FastAPI application
Implementing API endpoints for data ingestion, processing, and visualization
Deploying the application using popular platforms (e.g., Heroku, AWS, GCP)
Testing and monitoring the deployed application
version_notes:
Python 3.12 features used: 
- Enhanced PEP 604 type hints support
This guide has been tested using FastAPI version: 0.72.0
caveats: Ensure your environment is set up with the latest dependencies (FastAPI, Uvicorn, etc.)
Testing and monitoring tools may require additional configuration depending on the deployment platform
